column1: Smoque BBQ////When you walk in you are greeted with a sign telling you how the process of ordering works and they describe how their ribs are like meat jello which fall off the bone.    Well
column2: my rib meat didn't exactly 'Fall off the bone' and they were some of the driest ribs I have ever put in my mouth. The rub on the ribs was lacking in flavor and could have used a bit more salt.  Also
column3: the smoke flavor on the ribs and brisket was lacking this could be that they are cooking the ribs at a higher temp.  I can usually crush a half slab of ribs pretty easily
column4: but I could only eat half of the half slab.
